thread.title: Patriots Superfan Mark Wahlberg Left The Stadium In Third Quarter Of Super Bowl And Missed Pats Epic 4th Quarter Comeback
thread.title_full: Patriots Superfan Mark Wahlberg Left The Stadium In Third Quarter Of Super Bowl And Missed Pats Epic 4th Quarter Comeback

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Patriots Superfan Mark Wahlberg Left The Stadium In Third Quarter Of Super Bowl And Missed Pats Epic 4th Quarter Comeback
text:
Mark Wahlberg will probably never get to live this down. 
After the Patriots went down big in the third quarter, Mark Wahlberg up and left the NRG stadium and missed the Pats epic fourth quarter comeback. 
Never forget, New England. @Mark_Wahlberg left the #SB51 & we won the game. (via @Allen_Reid ) pic.twitter.com/eXInXHWbTI 
â€” Only In Boston (@OnlyInBOS) February 6, 2017 

Gotta revoke his Pats fan card forever now.
